entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned by name and referred to as 'Harry'.

entities.name: wood
entities.description: A person who yells out a warning to Harry from the Gryﬀindor goal posts.

entities.name: cedric diggory
entities.description: A person mentioned as pelting up the ﬁeld and playing Quidditch with Harry.

entities.name: nimbus
entities.description: Harry's broomstick, referred to as 'his Nimbus'.

entities.name: snitch
entities.description: A golden ball that is the goal of Quidditch, mentioned as shimmering in the air between Harry and Cedric.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Foul creatures that are standing beneath Harry on the ﬁeld.

relationships.description: Harry is controlling his broomstick, referred to as 'his Nimbus'.
Harry is trying to catch the Snitch, which is shimmering in the air between him and Cedric.
